short_text: It is derived from the word kuwwirat in the first verse. Kuwwirat is passive voice from takwir in the past tense, and means 'that which is folded up', thereby implying that it is a Surah in which the 'folding up' has been mentioned.
text: It is derived from the word kuwwirat in the first verse. Kuwwirat is passive voice from takwir in the past tense, and means "that which is folded up", thereby implying that it is a Surah in which the "folding up" has been mentioned:
The subject matter and the style clearly show that it is one of the earliest Surahs to be revealed at Makkah.
It has two themes: the Hereafter and the institution of Prophethood.

In the first six verses, the first stage of the Resurrection has been mentioned when the sun will lose its light, the stars will scatter, the mountains will be uprooted and will disperse, the people will become heedless of their dearest possessions, the beasts of the jungle will be stupefied and will gather together, and the seas will boil up. Then in the next seven verses, the second stage has been described when the souls will be reunited with the bodies, the records will be laid open, the people will be called to account for their crimes, the heavens will be unveiled, and Hell and Heaven will be brought into full view. After depicting the Hereafter thus, man has been left to ponder his own self and deeds, saying: "Then each man shall himself know what he has brought with him."

After this, the theme of Prophethood has been taken up. In this the people of Makkah have been addressed, as if to say "Whatever Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) is presenting before you, is not the bragging of a madman, nor an evil suggestion inspired by Satan, but the word of a noble, exalted and trustworthy messenger sent by God, whom Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) has seen with his own eyes in the bright horizon of the clear sky in broad daylight. Whither then are you going having turned away from this teaching?"
description: The surah that opens with a riveting description of The Winding Up of the sun at the end of earthly life and the dawn of eternity. It takes its name from “the winding up”, “the enfolding” or “the darkening” (takwīr) of the sun as mentioned in verse 1. The surah stress the fact that people will be confronted by their deeds on Judgement Day, asserting the truth of the Quran, and calling people to the right path. It opens with a powerful description of events on that Day.The surah is also known as: Shrouded in Darkness, The Cessation, The Compacting, The Darkening, The Enfolding, The Folding up, Wrapping Things Up.

Efendi Nahi.verse 81:4: dhe kur devet mbarsë të mbeten pa çoban (të pakujdes),
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:5: dhe kur shtazët e egra të tubohen,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:7: dhe kur shpirtërat bashkohen me trupëra,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:8: dhe kur vajza e varrosur për së gjalli, do të pyetet
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:10: dhe kur të shpërndahen listat (librat e veprave të njerëzve),
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:14: çdokush do të di për veprat që ka përgatitur.
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:15: Dhe – betohem në yjet – që perëndojnë
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:16: të cilët lëvizin dhe zhduken nga shikimi (horizonti),
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:17: dhe në natën kur bie terri,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:19: Me të vërtetë, Kur’ani është fjala e të Dërguarit fisnik (Xhebrailit),
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:20: të fuqishëm, të çmuar nga Zoti i Arshit (Kozmosit)
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:21: të cilin e dëgjojnë (engjëjt) dhe është i besuar (i madh).
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:22: E shoku juaj (Muhammedi), nuk është i marrë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:23: Ai (Muhammedi) e ka parë qartë (Xhebrailin) në horizont,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:24: dhe, kur është fjala për Shpalljen, ai (Muhammedi) nuk është dorështrënguar (nuk e mshehë atë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:25: dhe Kur’ani nuk është fjalë e djallit të mllkuar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:26: e, kah po ia mbani (me këto mendime)?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:27: Ai (Kur’ani), është vetëm këshillë, për tërë botën (njerëzit):
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:28: për ata nga ju që duan rrugën e vërtetë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 81:29: e ju nuk mund të dëshironi (të drejtën), përveç atëherë kur dëshiron Perëndia, Zoti i gjithë botërave!

null.verse 81:2: Ulduzlar (göydən qopub yağış dənələri kimi yerə) səpələnəcəyi zaman;
null.verse 81:3: Dağlar yerindən qopardılacağı (toz kimi havada uçacağı) zaman;
null.verse 81:4: (Bədəvi ərəblərin çox əziz tutduğu) boğaz dəvələr başlı-başına buraxılacağı zaman;
null.verse 81:5: Vəhşi heyvanlar (bir-birindən qisas almaq üçün) bir yerə toplanacağı zaman;
null.verse 81:6: Dənizlər od tutub yanacağı (və ya dolub daşacağı) zaman;
null.verse 81:7: Ruhlar (bədənlərə) qovuşacağı zaman;
null.verse 81:8: Diri-diri torpağa gömülən körpə qızdan:
null.verse 81:9: "Axı o hansı günaha görə öldürüldü?"; soruşulacağı zaman;
null.verse 81:14: Hər kəs (dünyada bugünkü günə özü üçün yaxşı, pis) nə hazır etdiyini biləcəkdir!
null.verse 81:15: And içirəm (gecə) yanıb (gündüz) sönən ulduzlara;
null.verse 81:16: (Günəşlə, ayla) seyr edib (onlar batdığı zaman) gizlənən səyyarələrə (Zühələ, Müştəriyə, Mərrixə, Zöhrəyə və Utaridə);
null.verse 81:17: Qaralmaqda olan gecəyə (yaxud: qaralmaqda və çəkilməkdə olan gecəyə)
null.verse 81:18: Və sökülməkdə olan dan yerinə ki,
null.verse 81:19: Bu (Qur'an Allah dərgahında) çox möhtərəm olan bir elçinin (Cəbrailin) gətirdiyi kəlamdır.
null.verse 81:20: (Elə bir elçi ki) çox qüvvətlidir; ərşin sahibi (Allah) yanında çox hörmətlidir (izzətlidir).
null.verse 81:21: (Elə bir elçi ki, mələklər arasında) itaət ediləndir, həm də (Allah yanında vəhyə) e'tibarlı müvəkkildir.
null.verse 81:22: (Ey Məkkə əhli!) Həqiqətən, sizin dostunuz (müşriklərin dediyi kimi) divanə deyildir!
null.verse 81:23: And olsun ki, (Peyğəmbər!) onu (Cəbraili) açıq (ən uca) üfüqdə gördü.
null.verse 81:24: O, qeyb (vəhyi olduğu kimi təbliğ etmək və sizə öyrətmək) barəsində xəsis deyildir.
null.verse 81:25: O (Qur'an) da məl'un (Allahın rəhmətindən qovulmuş) Şeytanın sözü deyildir.
null.verse 81:26: Elə isə (siz ondan üz döndərib) hara gedirsiniz?
null.verse 81:27: O, aləmlər (bütün insanlar və cinlər) üçün ancaq bir öyüd-nəsihətdir.
null.verse 81:28: Eləcə də sizdən doğru-düz (yolda) olmaq istəyənlər üçün.
null.verse 81:29: (Onu da bilin ki) aləmlərin Rəbbi olan Allah istəməsə, siz (bunu) istəyə bilməzsiniz! (Yalnız Allah istəsə, istəyə bilərsiniz. Siz insanlar həmişə Allahın qüdrəti, hökmü və iradəsi altındasınız. O sizi bir şeyi istəməyincə siz onu özünüzə istəyə bilməzsiniz. Ona görə də hər işdə Allaha təvəkkül edin!)

null.verse 81:4: i kada steone kamile
null.verse 81:5: i kada se divlje životinje saberu,
null.verse 81:6: i kada se mora vatrom napune,
null.verse 81:7: i kada se duše sa tijelima spare,
null.verse 81:8: i kada živa sahranjena djevojčica bude upitana
null.verse 81:14: svako će saznati ono što je pripremio,
null.verse 81:15: I kunem se zvijezdama - koje se skrivaju,
null.verse 81:16: koje se kreću i iz vida gube,
null.verse 81:17: i noći kad ona veo diže,
null.verse 81:18: i zorom kada diše -
null.verse 81:19: Kur’an je, zaista, kazivanje Izaslanika plemenitog,
null.verse 81:20: moćnog, od Gospodara svemira, cijenjenog,
null.verse 81:21: kome se drugi potčinjavaju, tamo pouzdanog!
null.verse 81:22: A drug vaš nije lud:
null.verse 81:23: on ga je na obzorju jasnom vidio
null.verse 81:24: i, kada je u pitanju Objava, on nije škrt
null.verse 81:25: i Kur’an nije prokletog šejtana govor,
null.verse 81:27: Kur’an je samo pouka svjetovima,
null.verse 81:28: onome od vas koji hoće da je na Pravome putu,
null.verse 81:29: a vi ne možete ništa htjeti ako to Allah, Gospodar svjetova, neće!

null.verse 81:4: যখন দশ মাসের গর্ভবতী উষ্ট্রীসমূহ উপেক্ষিত হবে;
null.verse 81:5: যখন বন্য পশুরা একত্রিত হয়ে যাবে,
null.verse 81:6: যখন সমুদ্রকে উত্তাল করে তোলা হবে,
null.verse 81:7: যখন আত্মাসমূহকে যুগল করা হবে,
null.verse 81:8: যখন জীবন্ত প্রোথিত কন্যাকে জিজ্ঞেস করা হবে,
null.verse 81:9: কি অপরাধে তাকে হত্য করা হল?
null.verse 81:12: যখন জাহান্নামের অগ্নি প্রজ্বলিত করা হবে
null.verse 81:14: তখন প্রত্যেকেই জেনে নিবে সে কি উপস্থিত করেছে।
null.verse 81:15: আমি শপথ করি যেসব নক্ষত্রগুলো পশ্চাতে সরে যায়।
null.verse 81:17: শপথ নিশাবসান ও
null.verse 81:18: প্রভাত আগমন কালের,
null.verse 81:19: নিশ্চয় কোরআন সম্মানিত রসূলের আনীত বাণী,
null.verse 81:20: যিনি শক্তিশালী, আরশের মালিকের নিকট মর্যাদাশালী,
null.verse 81:21: সবার মান্যবর, সেখানকার বিশ্বাসভাজন।
null.verse 81:22: এবং তোমাদের সাথী পাগল নন।
null.verse 81:23: তিনি সেই ফেরেশতাকে প্রকাশ্য দিগন্তে দেখেছেন।
null.verse 81:24: তিনি অদৃশ্য বিষয় বলতে কৃপনতা করেন না।
null.verse 81:25: এটা বিতাড়িত শয়তানের উক্তি নয়।
null.verse 81:27: এটা তো কেবল বিশ্বাবাসীদের জন্যে উপদেশ,
null.verse 81:28: তার জন্যে, যে তোমাদের মধ্যে সোজা চলতে চায়।
null.verse 81:29: তোমরা আল্লাহ রাব্বুল আলামীনের অভিপ্রায়ের বাইরে অন্য কিছুই ইচ্ছা করতে পার না।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:4: и когато бременните камили бъдат изоставени,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:8: и когато живопогребаното момиче бъде попитано
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:9: за какъв грях е било убито,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:10: и когато книгите [за делата] бъдат разгърнати,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:14: тогава всеки ще узнае какво е извършил.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:15: О, кълна се в залязващите планети,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:17: и в нощта, когато се здрачава,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:18: и в утринта, когато се развиделява -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:19: той [Коранът] е слово на достоен пратеник,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:20: имащ сила, утвърден при Владетеля на Трона.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:21: Покоряват му се [ангелите] там, доверен е.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:22: И не е луд вашият другар .
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:23: Той го видя на ясния хоризонт.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:25: И не е [Коранът] слово на прокуден сатана.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:27: Това е само поучение за световете -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:28: за всеки от вас, който желае да е на Правия път.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 81:29: Тогава ще пожелавате само онова, което желае Аллах, Господът на световете.

null.verse 81:4: 當孕駝被拋棄的時候，
null.verse 81:5: 當野獸被集合的時候，
null.verse 81:7: 當靈魂被配合的時候，
null.verse 81:8: 當被活埋的女孩被詢問的時候：
null.verse 81:10: 當功過簿被展開的時候，
null.verse 81:14: 每個人都知道他所作過的善惡。
null.verse 81:15: 我誓以運行的眾星——
null.verse 81:17: 和逝去時的黑夜，
null.verse 81:18: 照耀時的早晨，
null.verse 81:19: 這確是一個尊貴的使者的言辭，
null.verse 81:20: 他在寶座的主那裡，是有權力的，是有地位的，
null.verse 81:21: 是眾望所歸，而且忠於職守的。
null.verse 81:22: 你們的朋友，不是一個瘋人，
null.verse 81:23: 他確已看見那個天使在明顯的天邊，
null.verse 81:24: 他對幽玄不是吝教的。
null.verse 81:25: 這不是被放逐的惡魔的言辭，
null.verse 81:26: 然則，你們將往那裡去呢？
null.verse 81:27: 這只是對於全世界的教誨——
null.verse 81:28: 對於你們中欲循規蹈矩者的教誨，
null.verse 81:29: 你們不欲循規蹈矩，除非真主——全世界的主——意欲的時候。

null.verse 81:3: až hory se z místa pohnou,
null.verse 81:4: až březí velbloudice bude zanedbána
null.verse 81:5: a divoká zvířata shromážděna,
null.verse 81:7: a duše až se spáří,
null.verse 81:8: až zaživa pohřbená bude tázána,
null.verse 81:14: tehdy duše každá, co vykonala, pozná!
null.verse 81:15: Hle, přísahám při planetách zpět se vracejících,
null.verse 81:17: při noci, když v temno se halí,
null.verse 81:18: při jitru, když dechu nabírá,
null.verse 81:19: že toto věru slova jsou posla vznešeného,
null.verse 81:20: silou vládnoucího u Pána trůnu mohutného,
null.verse 81:21: poslušnost nalézajícího a spolehlivého!
null.verse 81:22: Váš druh není džiny posedlý blázen
null.verse 81:23: a vskutku jej viděl na obzoru jasném -
null.verse 81:24: a není skoupý o nepoznatelném!
null.verse 81:25: A nejsou to slova satana prokletého!
null.verse 81:27: Vždyť toto slouží jen lidstvu k připomenutí,
null.verse 81:28: těm z vás, kdo přejí si po stezce přímé jíti.
null.verse 81:29: Však přát si toho nebudete, pokud Bůh, Pán lidstva veškerého, nebude chtíti!

null.verse 81:2: En wanneer de sterren dof worden,
null.verse 81:4: En wanneer de drachtige kamelen worden verlaten,
null.verse 81:5: En wanneer de dieren worden bijeengegaard,
null.verse 81:6: En wanneer de zeëen worden geledigd,
null.verse 81:7: En wanneer de mensen worden verenigd,
null.verse 81:8: En wanneer er over het gedode kind (verantwoording) zal worden gevraagd
null.verse 81:9: Voor welke misdaad het gedood werd,
null.verse 81:11: En wanneer de Hemel wordt opengelegd,
null.verse 81:12: En wanneer de hel wordt ontstoken,
null.verse 81:13: En wanneer het paradijs nabij wordt gebracht,
null.verse 81:14: Dan zal ieder ziel weten wat zij heeft voorbereid.
null.verse 81:15: En Ik roep tot getuige datgene wat terugkeert,
null.verse 81:17: En de nacht wanneer deze heengaat.
null.verse 81:18: En de dageraad als deze aanbreekt.
null.verse 81:19: Dat is voorzeker de boodschap van een edele boodschapper,
null.verse 81:20: Vol van macht, bevestigd door de Heer van de Troon,
null.verse 81:21: Die gehoorzaamd moet worden en vertrouwenswaardig is.
null.verse 81:22: En uw metgezel is niet krankzinnig.
null.verse 81:23: En hij zag hem (Gabriël) aan de heldere horizon.
null.verse 81:24: En hij is geen vrek wat het onzienlijke aangaat.
null.verse 81:25: En dit is niet het woord van Satan de vervloekte.
null.verse 81:27: Dit is niets dan een vermaning voor de werelden.
null.verse 81:28: Voor hem onder u die oprecht wil wandelen.
null.verse 81:29: En gij zult niets willen behalve wat God wil, de Heer der Werelden.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:3: And when the hills are moved,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:4: And when the camels big with young are abandoned,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:5: And when the wild beasts are herded together,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:8: And when the girl-child that was buried alive is asked
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:9: For what sin she was slain,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:10: And when the pages are laid open,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:11: And when the sky is torn away,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:13: And when the Garden is brought nigh,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:14: (Then) every soul will know what it hath made ready.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:15: Oh, but I call to witness the planets,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:16: The stars which rise and set,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:19: That this is in truth the word of an honoured messenger,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:20: Mighty, established in the presence of the Lord of the Throne,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:22: And your comrade is not mad.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:23: Surely he beheld Him on the clear horizon.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:24: And he is not avid of the Unseen.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:25: Nor is this the utterance of a devil worthy to be stoned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:27: This is naught else than a reminder unto creation,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:28: Unto whomsoever of you willeth to walk straight.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 81:29: And ye will not, unless (it be) that Allah willeth, the Lord of Creation.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:1: When the sun (with its spacious light) is folded up;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:2: When the stars fall, losing their lustre;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:3: When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:4: When the she-camels, ten months with young, are left untended;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:5: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:6: When the oceans boil over with a swell;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:7: When the souls are sorted out, (being joined, like with like);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:8: When the female (infant), buried alive, is questioned -
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:9: For what crime she was killed;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:10: When the scrolls are laid open;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:11: When the world on High is unveiled;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:12: When the Blazing Fire is kindled to fierce heat;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:13: And when the Garden is brought near;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:14: (Then) shall each soul know what it has put forward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:15: So verily I call to witness the planets - that recede,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:17: And the Night as it dissipates;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:18: And the Dawn as it breathes away the darkness;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:19: Verily this is the word of a most honourable Messenger,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:20: Endued with Power, with rank before the Lord of the Throne,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:21: With authority there, (and) faithful to his trust.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:22: And (O people!) your companion is not one possessed;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:23: And without doubt he saw him in the clear horizon.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:24: Neither doth he withhold grudgingly a knowledge of the Unseen.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:25: Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:27: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:28: (With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 81:29: But ye shall not will except as God wills,- the Cherisher of the Worlds.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:1: When the sun shall be darkened,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:2: when the stars shall be thrown down,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:3: when the mountains shall be set moving,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:4: when the pregnant camels shall be neglected,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:5: when the savage beasts shall be mustered,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:6: when the seas shall be set boiling,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:7: when the souls shall be coupled,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:8: when the buried infant shall be asked
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:9: for what sin she was slain,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:10: when the scrolls shall be unrolled,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:11: when heaven shall be stripped off;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:12: when Hell shall be set blazing,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:13: when Paradise shall be brought nigh,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:14: then shall a soul know what it has produced.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:15: No! I swear by the slinkers,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:19: truly this is the word of a noble Messenger
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:20: having power, with the Lord of the Throne secure,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:23: he truly saw him on the clear horizon;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:24: he is not niggardly of the Unseen.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:25: And it is not the word of an accursed Satan;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:27: It is naught but a Reminder unto all beings,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:28: for whosoever of you who would go straight;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 81:29: but will you shall not, unless God wills, the Lord of all Being.

Muhammad Asad.verse 81:1: WHEN THE SUN is shrouded in darkness,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:2: and when the stars lose their light,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:3: and when the mountains are made to vanish,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:4: and when she-camels big with young, about to give birth, are left untended,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:5: and when all beasts are gathered together,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:6: and when the seas boil over,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:7: and when all human beings are coupled [with their deeds],
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:8: and when the girl-child that was buried alive is made to ask
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:9: for what crime she had been slain,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:10: and when the scrolls [of men’s deeds] are unfolded,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:11: and when heaven is laid bare,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:12: and when the blazing fire [of hell] is kindled bright,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:13: and when paradise is brought into view:
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:14: [on that Day] every human being will come to know what he has prepared [for himself].
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:15: BUT NAY! I call to witness the revolving stars,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:16: the planets that run their course and set,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:17: and the night as it darkly falls,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:18: and the morn as it softly breathes:
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:19: behold, this [divine writ] is indeed the [inspired] word of a noble Apostle,
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:20: with strength endowed, secure with Him who in almightiness is enthroned
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:21: [the word] of one to be heeded, and worthy of trust!
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:22: For this fellow-man of yours is not a madman:
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:23: he truly beheld [the angel – beheld] him on the clear horizon;
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:24: and he is not one to begrudge others the knowledge [of whatever has been revealed to him] out of that which is beyond the reach of human perception.
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:25: Nor is this [message] the word of any satanic force accursed.
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:27: This [message] is no less than a reminder to all mankind –
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:28: to every one of you who wills to walk a straight way.
Muhammad Asad.verse 81:29: But you cannot will it unless God, the Sustainer of all the worlds, wills [to show you that way].

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:1: When the sun will be folded up,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:2: and when the stars will swoop down,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:3: and when the mountains will be set in motion,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:4: and when the ten-months pregnant she-camels will be abandoned,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:5: and when the wild beasts will be gathered together,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:6: and when the seas will be flared up,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:7: and when the people will be arranged in categories,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:8: and when the girl-child that was buried alive will be asked,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:9: for what sin she was killed,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:10: and when the scrolls (of deeds) will be unrolled,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:11: and when the sky will be stripped off,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:12: and when the Hell will be set ablaze,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:13: and when the Paradise will be brought close,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:14: then everyone will know what he (or she) has put forward.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:15: So, I swear by those (stars) that recede,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:16: that proceed, that withdraw from the scene,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:17: and by the night when it departs,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:18: and the morning when it starts breathing,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:19: it (the Qur’ān) is surely the word of a noble messenger (Jibra’īl X),
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:20: the one possessing power and a high status with the Lord of the Throne,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:22: Your companion (Muhammad ) is not a madman,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:23: and he did see him (Jibra’īl X) on the clear horizon.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:24: And he (the Prophet) is not stingy about (the news of) the unseen.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:25: Nor is it the word of an outcast satan (devil).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:27: It is nothing else but a message of advice for all the worlds,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:28: for the benefit of any one from among you who intends to go straight.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 81:29: And you cannot intend (to do anything) unless it is so willed by Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:1: When the sun is folded away,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:3: and when the mountains are set in motion,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:4: and when the pregnant camels are neglected,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:5: and when the wild beasts are mustered,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:6: and when the seas are set afire,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:7: and when the souls are coupled,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:8: and when the girl buried-alive asks
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:9: for what sin she was slain,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:10: and when the scrolls are unrolled,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:11: and when the heaven is stripped off,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:12: and when the Hell-fire is set ablaze,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:13: and when Paradise is brought near,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:14: [then] a soul will know what it has presented.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:15: So I swear by the receding ,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:17: and [by] the night as it approaches,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:18: and [by] the dawn as it breathes,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:19: truly this is the word of a messenger [who is] noble,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:20: powerful, eminent in the presence of the Lord of the Throne;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:22: And your companion is not a madman.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:23: For verily he saw him on the clear horizon;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:24: and he is not to be accused of [knowing] the Unseen.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:25: And it is not the word of an accursed satan.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:27: It is only a reminder for all worlds,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:28: for those of you who wish to go straight;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 81:29: but you will not [wish], unless God, the Lord of the Worlds wills.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:1: When the sun will be folded up and extinguished,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:2: And the stars will fall (from their galaxies),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:3: And when the mountains, (after having changed into dust,) will be set in motion (into the atmosphere),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:4: And when the she-camels heavy with young will be left neglected and discarded (i.e., no one will tend them),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:5: And when (fear-stricken) wild beasts will be herded together,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:6: And when (all) oceans and rivers will be made to rise and swell,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:7: And when souls will be united (with their bodies),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:8: And when the infant girl buried alive will be asked,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:9: For what crime was she slain?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:10: And when the records of deeds will be laid open,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:11: And when the layers of heaven will be torn asunder and moved away from their places,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:12: And when (the Fire of) Hell will be burnt ablaze,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:13: And when Paradise will be brought up close,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:14: Everyone will come to know what he has brought forth.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:15: So I swear by (the heavenly spheres) which recede (after appearing),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:17: And by the night when its darkness tapers off,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:18: And by the morning when its light dawns,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:19: Indeed, this (Qur’an) is the Word (communicated) by a glorious and most venerable Messenger (blessings and peace be upon him),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:20: Who is mighty and strong (in calling to the truth, preaching the faith in Messengership and spiritual competence, and) is held in extreme reverence and veneration (and splendour and glory) in the presence of the Lord of the Throne,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:21: Entitled to obligatory obedience (by all the worlds because obedience to him is obedience to Allah) and faithful to His trust (possesses Revelation and all divine secrets of the heavens and the earth).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:22: And, (O people,) he who blesses you with his (holy) companionship (Muhammad [blessings and peace be upon him]) is not mad. (Whatever he communicates is the truth.)
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:23: And he has indeed seen (the absolute beauty of the Lord of the Throne) on the effulgent horizon (of the realm of Divinity).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:24: And he (the glorious Messenger [blessings and peace be upon him]) is not at all miserly in (disclosing) the unseen. (The Lord of the Throne has not left for him any deficiency.)
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:25: Nor is that (Qur’an) the utterance of any accursed Satan.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:26: Then, (O you doomed,) where are you going (disregarding such a valuable treasure)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:27: This (Qur’an) is but admonition (revealed) for all the worlds.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:28: Every one of you who aspires to tread the straight path (can take guidance from this source spring).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 81:29: And you can aspire only to what Allah intends, Who is the Sustainer of all the worlds.

null.verse 81:4: kun kantavat kameelit hylätään,
null.verse 81:5: kun pedot peloitetaan muille tienoille,
null.verse 81:7: kun sielut ja ruumiit jälleen yhtyvät
null.verse 81:8: ja kun elävänä haudatulta naiselta kysytään,
null.verse 81:14: silloin saa jokainen sielu tietää, mitä se on itselleen valmistanut.
null.verse 81:15: Vannon kautta tähtien,
null.verse 81:17: kautta saapuvan yön
null.verse 81:18: ja valkenevan aamun:
null.verse 81:19: »Tämä on totisesti jalon sananjulistajan sanoma,
null.verse 81:20: sellaisen, jonka valta tulee voiman Herralta,
null.verse 81:21: jota on toteltava ja joka ei luottamusta petä.
null.verse 81:22: Ei teidän heimolaisenne (profeetta) houraile.
null.verse 81:23: Totisesti hän on nähnyt enkeli Gabrielin kirkkaalla taivaanrannalla,
null.verse 81:24: eikä hän ole kitsas näkymättömien asiain salaaja;
null.verse 81:25: ei tämä myöskään ole karkoitetun paholaisen ennustelua.
null.verse 81:27: Tämä ei ole muuta kuin varoitus maailman kansoille,
null.verse 81:28: jokaiselle teistä, joka tahtoo pysytellä oikealla tiellä.
null.verse 81:29: Mutta ette te itse tahdo, ellei Jumala, maailmojen Herra,sitä tahdo.»

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:3: lorsque les montagnes seront mises en marche,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:4: lorsque les chamelles près de mettre bas seront délaissées,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:5: lorsque les bêtes sauvages seront rassemblées,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:6: lorsque les mers seront en ébullition,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:8: lorsque l'on demandera à la fillette enterrée vivante
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:9: pour quel crime elle a été tuée,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:11: lorsque le ciel sera dépouillé de son enveloppe,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:14: toute âme saura ce qu'elle a préparé.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:15: Non !... J'en jure par les planètes
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:17: par la nuit quand elle tombe,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:18: par l'aube quand elle exhale son souffle :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:19: cette Parole est vraiment celle d'un noble Envoyé,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:20: doué d'une grande force et d'un rang solide auprès du Maître du Trône,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:22: Votre compagnon n'est pas un possédé !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:23: Il l'a vu (l'ange) à l'horizon lumineux,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:24: et il ne garde pas jalousement le mystère.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:25: Ceci n'est pas la parole d'un démon maudit !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:27: Ceci n'est qu'un Rappel adressé aux mondes
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:28: pour celui d'entre vous qui veut suivre la voie droite.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 81:29: Mais vous ne le voudrez que si Dieu le veut, Lui, le Seigneur des mondes.

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:2: et que les étoiles deviendront ternes,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:3: et les montagnes mises en marche,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:4: et les chamelles à terme , négligées,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:8: et qu’on demandera à la fillette enterrée vivante
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:9: pour quel péché elle a été tuée.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:10: Et quand les feuilles seront déployées ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:14: chaque âme saura ce qu’elle a présenté.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:15: Non ! ... Je jure par les planètes qui gravitent
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:17: par la nuit quand elle survient !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:18: et par l’aube quand elle exhale son souffle !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:19: Ceci [le Coran] est la parole d’un noble Messager ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:20: doué d’une grande force, et ayant un rang élevé auprès du Maître du Trône,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:21: obéi, là-haut, et digne de confiance.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:23: il l’a effectivement vu (Gabriel), au clair horizon
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:24: et il ne garde pas avarement pour lui-même ce qui lui a été révélé.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:25: Et ceci [le Coran] n’est point la parole d’un diable banni.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:27: Ceci n’est qu’un rappel pour l’univers,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:28: pour celui d’entre vous qui veut suivre le chemin droit.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 81:29: Mais vous ne pouvez vouloir, que si Dieu veut, [Lui], le Seigneur de l’Univers;

null.verse 81:2: Und wenn die Sterne betrübt sind,
null.verse 81:3: Und wenn die Berge fortgeblasen werden,
null.verse 81:4: Und wenn die hochschwangeren Kamelstuten verlassen werden,
null.verse 81:5: Und wenn wildes Getier versammelt wird,
null.verse 81:7: Und wenn die Menschen einander nahe gebracht werden.
null.verse 81:8: Und wenn nach dem lebendig begrabenen Mädchen gefragt wird:
null.verse 81:10: Und wenn Schriften weithin verbreitet werden,
null.verse 81:11: Und wenn der Himmel aufgedeckt wird,
null.verse 81:12: Und wenn das Feuer angefacht wird,
null.verse 81:13: Und wenn der Garten nahe gebracht wird,
null.verse 81:14: Dann wird jede Seele wissen, was sie gebracht.
null.verse 81:15: Nein! Ich rufe die Planeten zu Zeugen - die rückläufigen,
null.verse 81:16: Die voraneilenden und die sich verbergenden -,
null.verse 81:17: Und die Nacht, wenn sie vergeht,
null.verse 81:18: Und die Morgenröte, wenn sie zu atmen beginnt,
null.verse 81:19: Daß dies in Wahrheit das (offenbarte) Wort eines edlen Gesandten ist,
null.verse 81:20: Eines Mächtigen - eingesetzt bei dem Herrn des Thrones -,
null.verse 81:21: Dem man dort gehorcht, Vertrauenswürdigen.
null.verse 81:22: Und euer Gefährte ist nicht toll.
null.verse 81:23: Denn er sah ihn (Gabriel) fürwahr am hellen Horizont.
null.verse 81:24: Und er ist nicht geizig in Sachen des Verborgenen.
null.verse 81:25: Noch ist dies das Wort Satans, des Verstossenen.
null.verse 81:27: Dies ist ja nur eine Ermahnung für alle Welten,
null.verse 81:28: Für die unter euch, die recht wandeln wollen,
null.verse 81:29: Dieweil ihr nicht anders wollt, als wie Allah will, der Herr der Welten.

null.verse 81:4: dan apabila unta-unta yang bunting ditinggalkan (tidak diperdulikan),
null.verse 81:5: dan apabila binatang-binatang liar dikumpulkan,
null.verse 81:7: dan apabila ruh-ruh dipertemukan (dengan tubuh),
null.verse 81:8: apabila bayi-bayi perempuan yang dikubur hidup-hidup ditanya,
null.verse 81:10: dan apabila catatan-catatan (amal perbuatan manusia) dibuka,
null.verse 81:14: maka tiap-tiap jiwa akan mengetahui apa yang telah dikerjakannya.
null.verse 81:15: Sungguh, Aku bersumpah dengan bintang-bintang,
null.verse 81:17: demi malam apabila telah hampir meninggalkan gelapnya,
null.verse 81:18: dan demi subuh apabila fajarnya mulai menyingsing,
null.verse 81:19: sesungguhnya Al Qur'an itu benar-benar firman (Allah yang dibawa oleh) utusan yang mulia (Jibril),
null.verse 81:20: yang mempunyai kekuatan, yang mempunyai kedudukan tinggi di sisi Allah yang mempunyai ’Arsy,
null.verse 81:21: yang ditaati di sana (di alam malaikat) lagi dipercaya.
null.verse 81:22: Dan temanmu (Muhammad) itu bukanlah sekali-kali orang yang gila.
null.verse 81:23: Dan sesungguhnya Muhammad itu melihat Jibril di ufuk yang terang.
null.verse 81:24: Dan Dia (Muhammad) bukanlah seorang yang bakhil untuk menerangkan yang gaib.
null.verse 81:25: Dan Al Qur'an itu bukanlah perkataan setan yang terkutuk,
null.verse 81:26: maka ke manakah kamu akan pergi?
null.verse 81:27: Al Qur'an itu tiada lain hanyalah peringatan bagi semesta alam,
null.verse 81:28: (yaitu) bagi siapa di antara kamu yang mau menempuh jalan yang lurus.
null.verse 81:29: Dan kamu tidak dapat menghendaki (menempuh jalan itu) kecuali apabila dikehendaki Allah, Tuhan semesta alam.

null.verse 81:3: e messe in marcia le montagne ,
null.verse 81:4: e neglette le cammelle gravide di dieci mesi ,
null.verse 81:5: e radunate le belve,
null.verse 81:7: e divise in gruppi le anime ,
null.verse 81:8: e quando verrà chiesto alla [neonata] sepolta viva
null.verse 81:9: per quale colpa sia stata uccisa. ,
null.verse 81:10: e quando saranno dispiegati i fogli ,
null.verse 81:14: ogni anima conoscerà quel che avrà prodotto .
null.verse 81:15: Giuro per i pianeti
null.verse 81:16: che passano e che si occultano ,
null.verse 81:17: per la notte che si estende,
null.verse 81:18: per l'aurora che esala il suo alito ,
null.verse 81:19: questa è la parola di un Messaggero nobilissimo,
null.verse 81:20: potente ed eccellente presso il Signore del Trono,
null.verse 81:21: colà obbedito e fedele.
null.verse 81:22: Il vostro compagno non è un folle :
null.verse 81:23: in verità l'ha visto sull'orizzonte luminoso ,
null.verse 81:24: non è avaro dell'lnvisibile .
null.verse 81:25: Questa non è parola di démone lapidato.
null.verse 81:27: Questo non è che un Monito rivolto al creato
null.verse 81:28: per chi di voi voglia seguire la Retta Via.
null.verse 81:29: Ma voi lo vorrete solo se lo vorrà Allah, il Signore dei mondi.

null.verse 81:1: 太陽が包み隠される時，
null.verse 81:4: 孕んで10ケ月の雌駱駝が等閑にされる時，
null.verse 81:5: 様々な野獣が（恐� の余り）群をなし集まる時，
null.verse 81:6: 大洋が沸きたち，(漆?)れる時，
null.verse 81:7: それぞれの魂が（肉体と）組み合わされる時，
null.verse 81:8: 生き埋められていた（女児が）
null.verse 81:9: どんな罪で殺されたかと問われる時，
null.verse 81:12: 獄火が炎を上げさせられる時，
null.verse 81:14: （その時）凡ての魂は，先に行った（善悪）の所業を知るであろう。
null.verse 81:15: わたしは沈みゆく諸星において誓う。
null.verse 81:16: （軌道を）運行して没する（諸星において）
null.verse 81:17: 暗闇を迎える夜において，
null.verse 81:18: 夜明けを迎える朝において（誓う）。
null.verse 81:19: 本当にこれ（クルアーン）は，高貴な使徒（ジブリール）の（アッラーからの）言葉
null.verse 81:20: （かれは）玉座の主の御前で（尊厳される地位の）座につく，力のある，
null.verse 81:21: 従われ，信頼される（使徒である）。
null.verse 81:22: （人びとよ）あなたかたの仲間（ムハンマド）は，気違いではない。
null.verse 81:23: かれは，明るい地平線上にはっきりとかれ（ジブリール）を見た。
null.verse 81:24: かれは幽玄界（の知っていること）を出し借しまない。
null.verse 81:25: それ（クルアーン）は，呪われた悪魔の言葉でもない。
null.verse 81:26: それなのにあなたがたは（それらのことを信用せず）何処へ行くのか。
null.verse 81:27: これ（クルアーン）こそは，万人への教訓に外ならない。
null.verse 81:28: それはあなたがたの中，誰でも正しい道を歩みたいと望む者のためのものである。
null.verse 81:29: だが万有の主，アッラーの御望みがない限り，あなたがたはこれを望むことも出来ないのである。

null.verse 81:4: 새끼를 밴지 열달이 된 암낙 타가 보호받지 못하고 버려지며
null.verse 81:5: 야생동물이 떼지어 모이고
null.verse 81:7: 영혼들이 유사하게 분리되고
null.verse 81:8: 여아가 산채로 매장되어 질문 을 받으니
null.verse 81:12: 타오르는 불지옥이 열을 세 차게 발산하며
null.verse 81:13: 천국이 의로운 자들에게 가 까이 오고
null.verse 81:14: 그때 모든 영혼은 그가 행한것들을 알게 되니라
null.verse 81:15: 실로 내가 지는 별들을 두고맹세하사
null.verse 81:17: 어둠을 맞이하는 밤을 두고 맹세하며
null.verse 81:18: 빛을 맞이하는 아침을 두고 맹세하나니
null.verse 81:19: 실로 이것은 고귀한 사도가 전한 말씀이라
null.verse 81:20: 그는 하나님 권좌 앞에 줄 지어 서 있는 강한자로
null.verse 81:21: 순종하고 믿음직하노라
null.verse 81:22: 그럼으로 너희의 동반자는 미친자가 아니며
null.verse 81:23: 그는 청명한 지평선에 있는 그를 보았으되
null.verse 81:24: 그가 보이지 않는 영역에 대한 지식을 인색하게 보류하고 있 는 것이 아니며
null.verse 81:25: 이것은 저주받은 사탄의 말 이 아니매
null.verse 81:27: 실로 이것은 만인을 위한 메 세지이며
null.verse 81:28: 너희 가운데 그 진리를 원하 는 자 그것을 따르도록 하려 함이 라
null.verse 81:29: 그러나 만유의 주님이신 주 님의 뜻이 없이는 너희는 아무 것 도 할 수 없노라

null.verse 81:1: کاتێك خۆر ده‌پێچرێته‌وه و ڕووناکی نامێنێت.
null.verse 81:2: کاتێکیش ئه‌ستێره‌کان (له خو‌لگه‌ی خۆیان) ده‌ترازێن و ده‌ده‌ن به‌یه‌کدا.
null.verse 81:3: کاتێك کێوه‌کان له شوێنی خۆیان هه‌ڵده‌که‌نرێن و به‌ملاولادا ده‌برێن.
null.verse 81:4: کا‌تێك حوشترانی ئاوس که ته‌مه‌نی باردارییان ده مانگه گوێیان پێنادرێت (بێگومان ئه‌و وشترانه لای عه‌ره‌ب زۆر نازدارن).
null.verse 81:5: کاتێك گیانله‌به‌رانی کێوی و وه‌حشی و دڕنده به ده‌وری یه‌کدا کۆده‌کرێنه‌وه (ئه‌وانیش دڕندایه‌تی خۆیانیان له بیر ده‌چێته‌وه له سامناکی ئه‌و ڕۆژه‌).
null.verse 81:6: کاتێك ده‌ریاکان گڕ ده‌درێن (دیاره که ته‌قینه‌وه‌ی ئه‌تۆمی ڕووده‌دات و ئاوی ده‌ریاکان ده‌بنه‌وه به هایدرۆجین و ئۆکسجین).
null.verse 81:7: کاتێك گیانی هه‌ر که‌س ده‌گه‌رێته‌وه بۆ لاشه‌ی و جووت ده‌بێته‌وه له‌گه‌ڵیدا.
null.verse 81:8: کاتێك کچی زینده به‌چاڵکراو پرسیاری لێده‌کرێت.
null.verse 81:9: به چ گوناهێك، به چ تۆمه‌تێك کوژرا؟!
null.verse 81:14: ئیتر ئه‌و کاته هه‌رکه‌س ده‌زانێت چی ئاماده کردووه و چ توێشوویه‌کی پێیه‌.
null.verse 81:15: سوێند به‌و ئه‌ستێرانه‌ی که په‌نهان ده‌بن و ون ده‌بن له‌چاو، یاخود به‌هۆی سوڕانه‌وه‌ی زه‌وی و خۆیانه‌وه (به‌هۆی هه‌ڵهاتنی خۆره‌وه‌) ون ده‌بن.
null.verse 81:16: به‌و هه‌سارانه‌ی که په‌نا ده‌گرن و دیار نامێنن.
null.verse 81:17: به‌و شه‌وه‌ی که دادێت و تاریکایه‌که‌ی ڕوومان تێده‌کات.
null.verse 81:18: به به‌ره‌به‌یان که پشووی تێدێت، وه‌کو زینده‌وه‌رێك ئاهی تێدێته‌وه و ده‌ست ده‌کات به هه‌ناسه‌دان و ژیان و ڕووناکیه‌که‌ی ده‌رده‌که‌وێت.
null.verse 81:19: (سوێند به‌وانه هه‌مووی) به‌ڕاستی، بێ دوودڵی ئه‌م قورئانه له‌زاری نێردراوێکی به‌ڕێزه‌وه‌یه (که جوبره‌ئیله‌).
null.verse 81:20: خاوه‌نی هێزو ده‌سه‌ڵاته و لای خاوه‌نی عه‌رش، فریشته‌یه‌کی پایه‌داره‌.
null.verse 81:21: فه‌رمانڕه‌وایه له‌وێ، هه‌روه‌ها ئه‌مین و دڵسۆزه له کاره‌کانیدا.
null.verse 81:22: دڵنیابن که هاورێکه‌تان { محمد (صلی الله علیه وسلم) } شێت نیه و (له‌که‌ماڵی ژیریدایه‌).
null.verse 81:23: بێگومان محمد (صلی الله علیه وسلم) جوبره‌ئیلی بینی به ئاشکرا له ئاسۆی نومایاندا.
null.verse 81:24: هه‌رچی پێ ده‌گات، له جیهانی نهێنی و شاراوه‌کانه‌وه‌، لێتان ناشارێته‌وه و ڕاستیتان پێ ڕاده‌گه‌یه‌نێت چونکه هه‌رگیز له گه‌یاندنی په‌یامه‌که‌یدا ڕژدو ڕه‌زیل نیه‌.
null.verse 81:25: ئه‌م قورئانه گوفتاری شه‌یتانی نه‌فرین لێکراو نیه‌.
null.verse 81:26: ئیتر بۆ کوێ ده‌چن؟ ڕوو ده‌که‌نه کوێ؟ ڕوو ده‌که‌نه کێ؟
null.verse 81:27: ئه‌م قورئانه ته‌نها یادخه‌ره‌وه‌یه بۆ سه‌رجه‌م دانیشتووانی زه‌وی (بۆ په‌ری و ئاده‌میزاد له هه‌موو سه‌رده‌مه‌کاندا).
null.verse 81:28: بۆ ئه‌وانه‌تان که ده‌یانه‌وێت ڕێبازی ڕاست و دروست بگرنه‌به‌ر.
null.verse 81:29: ویستی ئێوه‌ش نایه‌ته دێته دی مه‌گه‌ر کاتێك خوای په‌روه‌ردگاری جیهانیان بیه‌وێت، (هه‌رکه‌س ویستی خێری هه‌بێت خوای گه‌وره سه‌ربه‌رستی لێ زه‌وت ناکات، له‌گه‌ڵ ئه‌وه‌شدا هه‌ر ئه‌وه پێش دێت که ویستی خوای له‌سه‌ره و توانای تێگه‌یشتنمان له نهێنی و شاراوه‌کا‌ن زۆر سنوورداره‌).

null.verse 81:1: Apabila matahari dilingkari cahayanya (dan hilang lenyap);
null.verse 81:3: Dan apabila gunung-ganang di terbangkan ke angkasa (setelah dihancurkan menjadi debu);
null.verse 81:4: Dan apabila unta-unta yang bunting terbiar;
null.verse 81:5: Dan apabila binatang-binatang liar dihimpunkan;
null.verse 81:7: Dan apabila tiap-tiap diri disatukan dengan pasangannya;
null.verse 81:8: Dan apabila anak perempuan yang ditanam hidup-hidup: Ditanya,
null.verse 81:11: Dan apabila langit ditanggalkan dari tempatnya;
null.verse 81:14: (Setelah semuanya itu berlaku), tiap-tiap orang akan mengetahui tentang amal yang telah dibawanya.
null.verse 81:15: Oleh itu, Aku bersumpah dengan bintang-bintang yang tenggelam timbul;
null.verse 81:16: Yang beredar, juga yang tetap pada tempatnya;
null.verse 81:17: Dan malam, apabila ia hampir habis,
null.verse 81:18: Dan siang, apabila ia mulai terang;
null.verse 81:19: Sebenarnya Al-Quran itu, sungguh-sungguh Kalamullah (yang disampaikan oleh Jibril) Utusan yang mulia,
null.verse 81:20: Yang kuat gagah, lagi berkedudukan tinggi di sisi Allah yang mempunyai Arasy,
null.verse 81:21: Yang ditaati di sana (dalam kalangan malaikat), lagi dipercayai.
null.verse 81:22: Dan sebenarnya sahabat kamu (Nabi Muhammad) itu (wahai golongan yang menentang Islam), bukanlah dia seorang gila (seperti yang kamu tuduh);
null.verse 81:23: Dan (Nabi Muhammad yakin bahawa yang disampaikan kepadanya ialah wahyu dari Tuhan, kerana) demi sesungguhnya! Nabi Muhammad telah mengenal dan melihat Jibril di kaki langit yang nyata.
null.verse 81:24: Dan bukanlah Nabi Muhammad seorang yang boleh dituduh dan disangka buruk, terhadap penyampaiannya mengenai perkara-perkara yang ghaib.
null.verse 81:25: Dan sebenarnya Al-Quran itu bukanlah perkataan Syaitan yang kena rejam.
null.verse 81:26: (Dengan yang demikian) maka ke manakah kamu hendak pergi (kiranya kamu masih menyeleweng dari jalan Al-Quran)?
null.verse 81:27: Al-Quran itu tidak lain hanyalah peringatan bagi seluruh penduduk alam:
null.verse 81:28: Iaitu bagi sesiapa dari kamu yang mahu tetap teguh di atas jalan (Islam) yang betul.
null.verse 81:29: Dan kamu tidak dapat menentukan kemahuan kamu (mengenai sesuatupun), kecuali dengan cara yang diatur oleh Allah, Tuhan yang memelihara dan mentadbirkan seluruh alam.

null.verse 81:1: در آن هنگام كه خورشيد در هم پيچيده شود،
null.verse 81:2: و در آن هنگام كه ستارگان بى‏فروغ شوند،
null.verse 81:3: و در آن هنگام كه كوه‏ها به حركت درآيند،
null.verse 81:4: و در آن هنگام كه باارزش‏ترين اموال به دست فراموشى سپرده شود،
null.verse 81:5: و در آن هنگام كه وحوش جمع شوند،
null.verse 81:6: و در آن هنگام كه درياها برافروخته شوند،
null.verse 81:7: و در آن هنگام كه هر كس با همسان خود قرين گردد،
null.verse 81:8: و در آن هنگام كه از دختران زنده به گور شده سؤال شود:
null.verse 81:10: و در آن هنگام كه نامه‏هاى اعمال گشوده شود،
null.verse 81:11: و در آن هنگام كه پرده از روى آسمان برگرفته شود،
null.verse 81:12: و در آن هنگام كه دوزخ شعله‏ور گردد،
null.verse 81:13: و در آن هنگام كه بهشت نزديك شود،
null.verse 81:14: (آرى در آن هنگام) هر كس مى‏داند چه چيزى را آماده كرده است!
null.verse 81:15: سوگند به ستارگانى كه بازمى‏گردند،
null.verse 81:16: حركت مى‏كنند و از ديده‏ها پنهان مى‏شوند،
null.verse 81:17: و قسم به شب، هنگامى كه پشت كند و به آخر رسد،
null.verse 81:18: و به صبح، هنگامى كه تنفس كند،
null.verse 81:19: كه اين () كلام فرستاده بزرگوارى است ( جبرئيل امين)
null.verse 81:20: كه صاحب قدرت است و نزد (خداوند) صاحب عرش، مقام والائى دارد!
null.verse 81:21: در آسمانها مورد اطاعت (فرشتگان) و امين است!
null.verse 81:22: و مصاحب شما ( پيامبر) ديوانه نيست!
null.verse 81:23: او (جبرئيل) را در افق روشن ديده است!
null.verse 81:24: و او نسبت به آنچه از طريق وحى دريافت داشته بخل ندارد!
null.verse 81:25: اين () گفته شيطان رجيم نيست!
null.verse 81:27: اين چيزى جز تذكرى براى جهانيان نيست،
null.verse 81:28: براى كسى از شما كه بخواهد راه مستقيم در پيش گيرد!
null.verse 81:29: و شما اراده نمى‏كنيد مگر اينكه خداوند -پروردگار جهانيان- اراده كند و بخواهد!

null.verse 81:4: Quando as camelas, com crias de dez meses, forem abandonadas,
null.verse 81:5: Quando as feras forem congregadas,
null.verse 81:7: Quando as almas forem reunidas,
null.verse 81:8: Quando a filha, sepultada vida, for interrogada:
null.verse 81:13: E quando o jardim for aproximado,
null.verse 81:14: Então, saberá , cada alma, o que está apresentando.
null.verse 81:15: Juro pelos planetas,
null.verse 81:16: Que se mostram e se escondem,
null.verse 81:17: E pela noite, quando escurece,
null.verse 81:18: E pela aurora, quando afasta a escuridão,
null.verse 81:19: Que (o Alcorão) é a palavra de um honorável Mensageiro,
null.verse 81:20: Forte, digníssimo, ante o Senhor do Trono.
null.verse 81:21: Que deve ser obedecido, e no qual se deve confiar.
null.verse 81:22: E o vosso companheiro (ó povos), não é um energúmeno!
null.verse 81:23: Ele o viu (Gabriel), no claro horizonte,
null.verse 81:24: E não é avaro, quanto ao incognoscível.
null.verse 81:25: E não é (o Alcorão) a palavra do maldito Satanás.
null.verse 81:27: Certamente, não é mais do que uma mensagem, para o universo.
null.verse 81:28: Para quem de vós se quiser encaminhar.
null.verse 81:29: Porém, não vos encaminhareis, salvo se Deus, o Senhor do Universo, assim o permitir.

Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:2: Și când stelele se vor risipi
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:3: Și când munții vor fi spulberați
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:4: Și cãmilele îngreunate de zece luni vor fi neîngrijite,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:6: Și când mãrile se vor aprinde,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:7: Când sufletele se vor împerechea [cu trupurile lor]
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:8: Și când fetița îngropatã de vie va fi întrebatã
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:9: Pentru ce pãcat a fost omorâtã,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:10: Când foile vor fi desfãcute și împãrțite
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:11: Și când cerul va fi îndepãrtat,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:13: Și când Raiul va fi adus aproape,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:14: Atunci va ști [fiecare] suflet ce a adus.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:15: Dar nu! Jur pe stelele ce fug înapoi,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:19: Acesta este cuvântul unui trimis darnic,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:20: Înzestrat cu mare putere, cu vazã la Stãpânul Tronului,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:21: Cãruia i se aratã supunere acolo, cinstit.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:23: El l-a vãzut în zarea limpede.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:24: Și el nu este cu necunoscutul [ce i-a fost revelat] zgârcit.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:25: Acesta nu este nici cuvântul unui șeitan alungat cu pietre!
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:27: El nu este decât o îndemnare pentru lumi,
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:28: Pentru acela dintre voi care voiește sã meargã pe drumul celdrept.
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 81:29: Dar voi nu puteți voi decât dacã voiește Allah, Stãpânul lumilor.

George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:3: când munţii vor fi puşi în mişcare,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:4: când cămilele în zece luni lăsate în uitare,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:8: când copila de vie îngropată va fi întrebată
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:9: pentru care păcat a fost omorâtă,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:11: când cerul va fi dat la o parte,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:14: atunci fiece suflet va şti ceea ce a adus.
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:19: Acesta este cuvântul unui prea-cinstit trimis,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:20: cu putere de la Stăpânul Tronului Nezdruncinat,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:23: El l-a văzut în zare desluşit;
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:24: şi El cu Taina nu este zgârcit.
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:25: Acesta nu este cuvântul unui diavol la pietre luat!
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:27: Aceasta este doar o amintire pentru lumi,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:28: pentru aceia dintre voi care vor să calce drept.
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 81:29: Voi nu voiţi însă decât ceea ce Dumnezeu, Stăpânul lumilor, voieşte!

null.verse 81:3: Когда, (подобно миражу),Придут в движенье и исчезнут горы,
null.verse 81:4: Когда верблюдицы, несущие во чревепоследний месяц,Будут без присмотра,
null.verse 81:5: Когда в стада собьются звери(без разделения на виды),
null.verse 81:6: Когда набухнут и прольются все моря,
null.verse 81:7: Когда распределятся души(по заслугам),
null.verse 81:8: Когда зарытую живьеммладенца-девочку воспросят,
null.verse 81:9: За грех какой она была убита,
null.verse 81:10: Когда раскрыты будут свитки (записейдобра и зла),
null.verse 81:14: (Тогда) познает каждая душа,Что было ею уготовано вперед.
null.verse 81:15: Но нет! В знак отступающих планет,
null.verse 81:16: Которые восходят (при закате)И исчезают (при восходе солнца),
null.verse 81:17: В знак все темнеющего крова ночи
null.verse 81:18: И в знак зари, что выдыхает свет,
null.verse 81:19: Сие2305а, поистине, принесеноДостойным вестником (Аллаха)2306,
null.verse 81:20: Кому у Властелина Трона даныи сила, и почет,
null.verse 81:21: Кому дано повелеватьИ верным быть перед доверием Его.
null.verse 81:22: (О люди!) Ваш собрат2307неодержим, —
null.verse 81:23: Ведь, истинно, он лицезрел его2308на ясном горизонте,
null.verse 81:24: И не скупится он (вам передатьВесть) о Незримом.
null.verse 81:25: Сие — не проповедь гонимого(камнями) Сатаны.
null.verse 81:27: Поистине, посланье это —увещевание мирам,
null.verse 81:28: Тем, кто идти желает праведнымпутем.
null.verse 81:29: Но не дано вам ничего желать,Пока Аллах, Владыка всех миров,не повелит вам это.

null.verse 81:2: cuando las estrellas pierdan su brillo,
null.verse 81:3: cuando las montañas sean puestas en marcha,
null.verse 81:4: cuando las camellas preñadas de diez meses sean descuidadas,
null.verse 81:5: cuando las bestias salvajes sean agrupadas,
null.verse 81:7: cuando las almas sean apareadas,
null.verse 81:8: cuando se pregunte a la niña enterrada viva
null.verse 81:9: qué crimen cometió para que la mataran,
null.verse 81:12: cuando el fuego de la gehena sea avivado,
null.verse 81:14: cada cual sabrá lo que presenta.
null.verse 81:15: ¡Pues no! ¡Juro por los planetas,
null.verse 81:17: ¡Por la noche cuando se extiende!
null.verse 81:18: ¡Por la mañana cuando respira!
null.verse 81:19: Sí, es la palabra de un Enviado noble,
null.verse 81:20: que dispone de poder junto al Señor del Trono, firme,
null.verse 81:21: obedecido allís de confianza.
null.verse 81:22: ¡Vuestro paisano no es un poseso!
null.verse 81:23: Le ha visto en el claro horizonte,
null.verse 81:24: no es avaro de lo oculto.
null.verse 81:25: No es la palabra de un demonio maldito.
null.verse 81:27: No es sino una amonestación dirigida a todo el mundo,
null.verse 81:28: para aquéllos de vosotros que quieran seguir la vía recta.
null.verse 81:29: Pero vosotros no lo querréis, a menos que quiera Alá, Señor del universo.

null.verse 81:4: சூல் நிறைந்த ஒட்டகைகள் (கவனிப்பாரற்று) விடப்படும் போது-
null.verse 81:5: காட்டு மிருகங்கள் (மனிதர்களுடனும், இதர பிராணிகளுடனும்) ஒன்று சேர்க்கப்படும்போது-
null.verse 81:7: உயிர்கள் ஒன்றிணைக்கப்படும் போது-
null.verse 81:8: உயிருடன் புதைக்கப்பட்ட பெண் (குழந்தை) வினவப்படும் போது-
null.verse 81:14: ஒவ்வோர் ஆத்மாவும், தான் கொண்டு வந்ததை அறிந்து கொள்ளும்.
null.verse 81:15: எனவே, பின்னே விலகிச் செல்பவை (கிரகங்களின்) மீது சத்தியமாக-
null.verse 81:17: பின்வாங்கிச் செல்லும் இரவின் மீதும்,
null.verse 81:18: மூச்சுவிட்டுக் கொண்டெழும் வைகறையின் மீதும் சத்தியமாக.
null.verse 81:19: நிச்சயமாக (இக்குர்ஆன்) மிகவும் கண்ணியமிக்க ஒரு தூதுவர் (ஜிப்ரயீல் மூலம் வந்த) சொல்லாகும்.
null.verse 81:20: (அவர்) சக்திமிக்கவர்; அர்ஷுக்குடையவனிடம் பெரும் பதவியுடையவர்.
null.verse 81:21: (வானவர் தம்) தலைவர்; அன்றியும் நம்பிக்கைக்குரியவர்.
null.verse 81:22: மேலும் உங்கள் தோழர் பைத்தியக்காரர் அல்லர்.
null.verse 81:23: அவர் திட்டமாக அவரை (ஜிப்ரயீலை) தெளிவான அடிவானத்தில் கண்டார்.
null.verse 81:24: மேலும், அவர் மறைவான செய்திகளை கூறுவதில் உலோபித்தனம் செய்பவரல்லர்.
null.verse 81:25: அன்றியும், இது விரட்டப்பட்ட ஷைத்தானின் வாக்கல்ல.
null.verse 81:27: இது, அகிலத்தாருக்கெல்லாம் உபதேசமாகும்.
null.verse 81:28: உங்களில் நின்றும் யார் நேர்வழியை விரும்புகிறாரோ, அவருக்கு (நல்லுபதேசமாகும்).
null.verse 81:29: ஆயினும், அகிலங்களுக்கெல்லாம் இறைவனாகிய அல்லாஹ் நாடினாலன்றி நீங்கள் (நல்லுபதேசம் பெற) நாடமாட்டீர்கள்.

null.verse 81:1: เมื่อดวงอาทิตย์ถูกม้วนดับแสงลง
null.verse 81:2: และเมื่อบรรดาดวงดาวร่วงหล่นลงมากระจัดกระจาย
null.verse 81:3: และเมื่อบรรดาภูเขาถูกเคลื่อนย้าย
null.verse 81:4: และเมื่ออูฐท้องสิบเดือนถูกทอดทิ้ง
null.verse 81:5: และเมื่อสัตว์ถูกนำมารวมกัน
null.verse 81:6: และเมื่อทะเลลุกเป็นไฟ
null.verse 81:7: และเมื่อชีวิตทั้งหลายถูกจัดเป็นคู่
null.verse 81:8: และเมื่อทารกหญิงที่ถูกฝังทั้งเป็นถูกถาม
null.verse 81:9: ด้วยความผิดอันใดเขาจงถูกฆ่า
null.verse 81:10: และเมื่อบันทึกทั้งหลายถูกกางแผ่
null.verse 81:11: และเมื่อชั้นฟ้าถูกเลิกออก
null.verse 81:12: และเมื่อนรกถูกจุดให้ลุกสว่างจ้า
null.verse 81:13: และเมื่อสวรรค์ถูกนำมาใกล้
null.verse 81:14: ทุกชีวิตย่อมรู้สิ่งที่ตนได้นำมา
null.verse 81:15: ข้าสาบานต่อดวงดาวที่ซ่อนตัวในเวลากลางวัน
null.verse 81:16: ที่โคจรลับดวง
null.verse 81:17: ข้าสาบานด้วยกลางคืนเมื่อมันเหือดหายไป
null.verse 81:18: และด้วยเวลาเช้าตรู่เมื่อมันทอแสง
null.verse 81:19: แท้จริง อัลกุรอานคือคำพูดของร่อซู้ล (ญิบรีล) ผู้ทรงเกียรติ
null.verse 81:20: ผู้ทรงพลัง ผู้ทรงตำแหน่งสูง ณ พระเจ้าแห่งบัลลังก์
null.verse 81:21: ผู้ใดรับการจงรักภักดี ผู้ซื่อสัตย์ ณ ที่โน้น
null.verse 81:22: และสหาย (มุฮัมมัด) ของพวกเจ้านั้นมิใช่เป็นคนวิกลจริตแต่ประการใด
null.verse 81:23: และโดยแน่นอนเขา (มุฮัมมัด) ได้เห็นเขา (ญิบรีล) ณ ขอบฟ้าอย่างชัดแจ้ง
null.verse 81:24: และเขา (มุฮัมมัด) มิใช่เป็นผู้ตระหนี่ในเรื่องเร้นลับ
null.verse 81:25: และอัลกุรอานนี้มิใช่คำกล่าวของชัยตอนที่ถูกสาปแช่ง
null.verse 81:26: แล้วพวกเจ้าจะไปทางไหนเล่า
null.verse 81:27: อัลกุรอานนั้นมิใช่อื่นใด นอกจากเป็นข้อตักเตือนแก่ประชาชาติทั้งมวล
null.verse 81:28: สำหรับบุคคลในหมู่พวกเจ้าที่ประสงค์อยู่ในทางอันเที่ยงตรง
null.verse 81:29: และพวกเจ้าจะไม่สมประสงค์สิ่งใดเว้นแต่อัลลอฮ์พระเจ้าแห่งสากลโลกจะทรงประสงค์

null.verse 81:4: Gebe develer salıverildiğinde,
null.verse 81:5: Vahşî hayvanlar toplanıp bir araya getirildiğinde,
null.verse 81:7: Ruhlar (bedenlerle) birleştirildiğinde,
null.verse 81:8: Diri diri toprağa gömülen kıza, sorulduğunda,
null.verse 81:14: Kişi neler getirdiğini öğrenmiş olacaktır.
null.verse 81:15: Şimdi yemin ederim o sinenlere ,
null.verse 81:17: Kararmaya yüz tuttuğunda geceye andolsun,
null.verse 81:18: Ağarmaya başladığında sabaha andolsun ki,
null.verse 81:19: O (Kur'an), şüphesiz değerli,bir elçinin (Cebrail'in) getirdiği sözdür.
null.verse 81:20: O elçi güçlü, Arş'ın sahibi (Allah'ın) katında çok itibarlıdır.
null.verse 81:21: O orada sayılan, güvenilen (bir elçi) dir.
null.verse 81:22: Arkadaşınız (Muhammed) de mecnun değildir.
null.verse 81:23: Andolsun ki, onu (Cebrail'i) apaçık ufukta görmüştür.
null.verse 81:24: O, gaybın bilgilerini (sizden) esirgemez.
null.verse 81:25: O lânetlenmiş şeytanın sözü de değildir.
null.verse 81:27: O, herkes için, bir öğüttür,
null.verse 81:28: Sizden doğru yolda gitmek isteyenler için de.
null.verse 81:29: Alemlerin Rabbi Allah dilemedikçe siz dileyemezsiniz. l. Gökyüzü yarıldığı zaman,

null.verse 81:4: Ва, вақтики, ҳомиласига ўн ой тўлган туялар қаровсиз қолса.
null.verse 81:5: Ва, вақтики, ваҳший ҳайвонлар бир жойга тўпланса.
null.verse 81:6: Ва, вақтики, денгизлар аланга олиб ёнса.
null.verse 81:7: Ва вақтики, нафслар жуфтлаштирилса. (Яъни, руҳ танага қайтарилиб, икковлари бирлашсалар.)
null.verse 81:8: Ва вақтики, тириклай кўмилган қиздан сўралса.
null.verse 81:14: Ҳар бир жон нима ҳозирланганини билади.
null.verse 81:15: (Кундузи) махфий бўлувчи(юлдуз)лар билан қасам.
null.verse 81:17: Қоронғулиги билан кириб келган кеча билан қасам.
null.verse 81:18: Нафас олиб, кириб келган тонг билан қасам.
null.verse 81:19: Албатта у(Қуръон) карамли Расулнинг сўзидир.
null.verse 81:20: У қувватлидир. Арш эгаси ҳузурида мартабаси олийдир.
null.verse 81:21: Итоат қилинган, омонатли.
null.verse 81:22: Сизнинг соҳибингиз мажнун эмас.
null.verse 81:23: Батаҳқиқ ул ани очиқ-ойдин уфқда кўрди. (Муҳаммад с. а.в. Жиброилни очиқ-ойдин уфқда ўз кўзлари билан асл яратилишида кўрдилар.)
null.verse 81:24: Ва у ғайбга бахил эмас.
null.verse 81:25: Ва у(Қуръон) тошбўрон қилинган шайтоннинг сўзи эмас.
null.verse 81:27: У (Қуръон) оламларга эслатмадан бошқа нарса эмас.
null.verse 81:28: Сизлардан мустақим бўлишни хоҳловчилар учун.
null.verse 81:29: Оламларнинг Роббиси Аллоҳ хоҳламаса, сизлар хоҳлай олмассизлар. (Ҳар бир нарса Аллоҳнинг хоҳишига боғлиқ. Ҳар бир нарса Аллоҳ таолонинг хоҳиши ила бўлади.)
